long_description: CycleAware Moto Case bike handlebar bag stashes small riding essentials in a stylish, easily accessible bag. Use it for day-to-day transport and everyday jaunts. Bag attaches easily and securely to your handlebar via 2 straps with clips. Weather-resistant synthetic leather construction helps protect contents if you get caught in some light, unexpected rain. Main compartment has an internal zip pocket and ID holder; additional pockets include front zip pocket and front drop-in pocket. Reflective panel increases visibility in dim light. Top grab handle for easy off-bike carrying.
short_description: CycleAware Moto Case bike handlebar bag stashes small riding essentials in a stylish, easily accessible bag. Use it for day-to-day transport and everyday jaunts.
